parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the color of left picture of a tree item defined by path when item is disabled

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control [[tvSetPictureColorDisabled]] [path, color]

</value></part><part><name> p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name> p2</name>=<value> [path, color]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name> p3</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - path to tree view item

</value></part><part><name> p4</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - color in format [r,g,b,a]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[tvSetPictureColorDisabled]] [[0], [1,0,1,1]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvSetText]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetPictureColor]], [[tvSetPictureRight]], [[tvSetPictureColor]], [[tvSetPictureColorSelected]], [[tvSetPictureRightColor]], [[tvSetPictureRightColorSelected]], [[tvSetPictureRightColorDisabled]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
</dl>
